summary: The Django core mail package implements the infrastructure for creating, encoding, and dispatching email messages. It supplies high‑level helpers for sending messages through configurable back‑ends, notifying administrators and managers, handling bulk mail, and includes utilities for safe MIME processing, address validation, and efficient DNS name resolution.
business_intent: Enable Django applications to reliably send various types of email (plain text, HTML, multipart, with attachments) and automate notifications to site personnel, while abstracting backend connections and providing performance‑optimized utilities for email handling.
